content.rendered:
Description

Benefits for you:

  • Keeps you safe from viruses, attacks, fraud, ransomware, spyware and cybercrime
  • Protects your privacy and personal data against phishing, tracking & spying
  • Automatically adds extra security when you are online shopping or banking
  • Makes it easy to protect kids against online risks via Parental Control on PC and Mac computers
  • Secures PCs, Macs and mobile devices with just one product & one license

Kaspersky Internet Security protects all of the devices in your digital life. You can surf, socialize, shop and stream while award-winning security helps safeguard you from infections, spam, phishing and dangerous websites. It also helps protect your privacy by guarding your personal data and blocking trackers and webcam spies. Plus, whether you’re at home or on public Wi-Fi, it helps protect your communications, identity and data.
